description.value:
Arm/Wrist Mounted, has three auto-injectors and a saw for cutting through armour. Provides all benefits of Good-Craftsmanship Medikit, user can administer a dose of drugs from one of the injectors as a Free Action. Each injector can store a different drug. Saw can be used in melee: Profile (1d10+1 R, Pen 2, Tearing, Unwieldy).

Requirements

Medical saw can be used as melee weapon, but shouldnâ€™t be. Good Quality Medikit: +20 to Medicae, even if use doesn't possess Medicae Skill

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
